import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default function Weather() { let [currentCity, setCurrentCity] = useState(""); let [temperature, setTemperature] = useState(""); let apiKey = `e2cf4b573a64292860e147bb5f7b421d`; let citySearched = "Seattle"; let apiUrl = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${citySearched}&appid=${apiKey}&units=metric`; axios.get(apiUrl).then(showTemperature); function showTemperature(response) { setTemperature(Math.round(response.data.main.temp)); } return (
